      • applySha256

        public static byte[] applySha256​(byte[] input)
                          throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Calculate SHA-256 hash of the given input byte array.
        Parameters:
        input - data byte array
        Returns:
        byte array of size 32 containing the hash
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if no SHA-256 algorithm found

      • applyECDSASig

        public static byte[] applyECDSASig​(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
                                   byte[] input)
                            throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Apply ECDSA signature to the input data using the provided private key.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - private key to sign the data
        input - input byte array
        Returns:
        byte array with signature
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if no ECDSA algorithm was found, the key is invalid or some exception was thrown when generating signature

      • verifyECDSASig

        public static boolean verifyECDSASig​(java.security.PublicKey publicKey,
                                     byte[] data,
                                     byte[] signature)
                              throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Verify ECDSA signature with the given data and public key.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - public key
        data - data byte array
        signature - signature byte array
        Returns:
        whether the signature is authentic
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if no ECDSA algorithm was found, the key is invalid or some exception was thrown when verifying signature
